definition: not follow the beaten track/have an original style
premolar tooth (immediately behind canine teeth in some mammals)

sentences.english: Though thou shouldst bray a fool in the mortar, as when a pestle striketh upon sodden barley, his folly would not be taken from him.
sentences.chinese: 你儘可在臼中將愚人舂碎，但他的昏愚卻永不能剷除。

sentences.english: Dry fry the cumin and coriander seeds, then grind them into a powder using a pestle and mortar.
sentences.chinese: 幹炒孜然和芫荽籽，然後用杵和臼磨成碎末。

sentences.english: He was hipped when he dropped from the tree.
sentences.chinese: 他從樹上跌落了下來，把髖關節摔脫了臼。

sentences.english: The farmers pound rice in a mortar.
The old man disjointed his knee when he fell.
sentences.chinese: 老人跌跤時把膝關節摔脫了臼。

sentences.english: She was pounding it in a mortar with a pestle, to separate the husks.
sentences.chinese: 她把稻米放入臼鉢裏，用杵搗着，以分離稻殼。

sentences.english: For sublingual-administered drugs, have client place medication under tongue and allow it to dissolve completely.
sentences.chinese: 如病人吞藥有困難，可用藥臼或碎藥器研碎藥片。

sentences.english: The right wrist of the sheriff was all but dislocated.
sentences.chinese: 郡長的右腕差一點脫了臼。

sentences.english: The conjurer threw the watch into the mortar and grasped a sledgehammer from the table.
sentences.chinese: 魔術師把表扔進臼裏，從桌子上拿起一把大錘。

sentences.english: He fell from the window sill and put his shoulder out.
sentences.chinese: 他從窗臺下摔了下來，跌得肩膀脫了臼。

sentences.english: "Atoll acetabular valley Natural Beauty" at the Ming Tombs about 4 km northwest.
sentences.chinese: “碓臼峪自然風景區”在明十三陵西北約4公里處。

sentences.english: This glass is ground under water using pestle and mortar.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃在水下被杵和臼碾壓。

sentences.english: A series of collapse craters, or calderas, lie at its summit.
sentences.chinese: 其頂端有一系列崩塌的火山口，或稱火山臼。

sentences.english: He yawned his jaws out of joint.
sentences.chinese: 他打呵欠打得下巴關節脫了臼。

sentences.english: The boats then stopped and returned to the Japanese port of Rausu.
sentences.chinese: 漁船停下並返回日本羅臼町的港口。

definition: to roll up into a ball with one's hands/spiral/circle/variant of 團|团[tuan2]
"blade of grass" component in Chinese characters
chisel/to bore a hole/to chisel or dig/(literary) (bound form) certain/authentic/irrefutable/also pr. [zuo4]
to keep out/to hold off/to ward off/to evade/to spread/to coat/to smear/to daub
